if x=1 then sin(x)=0,841470984807897 and  cos(x)=0,54030230586814 
if x=2 then sin(x)=0,909297426825682 and  cos(x)=-0,416146836547142 
if x=3 then sin(x)=0,141120008059867 and  cos(x)=-0,989992496600445 
if x=4 then sin(x)=-0,756802495307928 and  cos(x)=-0,653643620863612 
if x=5 then sin(x)=-0,958924274663138 and  cos(x)=0,283662185463226
